verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye now what the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w saith|strong="H0559"\w*; \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w contend|strong="H7378"\w* thou before the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and let the \w hills|strong="H1389"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.\f + \fr 6.1 \ft before: or, with\f*

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye, O \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w controversy|strong="H7379"\w*, and ye \w strong|strong="H0386"\w* \w foundations|strong="H4146"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath a \w controversy|strong="H7379"\w* with his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and he will \w plead|strong="H3198"\w* with \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
O my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, what have I \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto thee? and wherein have I \w wearied|strong="H3811"\w* thee? \w testify|strong="H6030"\w* against me.

For I brought thee \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* thee out of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*; and I \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w*.

O my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* now what \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w consulted|strong="H3289"\w*, and what \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Beor|strong="H1160"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* him from \w Shittim|strong="H7851"\w* unto \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*; that ye may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Wherewith shall I come \w before|strong="H6923"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add and\add* \w bow|strong="H3721"\w* myself before the \w high|strong="H4791"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*? shall I come \w before|strong="H6923"\w* him with burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, with \w calves|strong="H5695"\w* of a \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*?\f + \fr 6.6 \ft of a…: Heb. sons of a year?\f*

Will the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* be \w pleased|strong="H7521"\w* with \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* of \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \add or\add* with ten \w thousands|strong="H7233"\w* of \w rivers|strong="H5158"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*? shall I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* my \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \add for\add* my \w transgression|strong="H6588"\w*, the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of my \w body|strong="H0990"\w* \add for\add* the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* of my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*?\f + \fr 6.7 \ft body: Heb. belly\f*

He hath \w shewed|strong="H5046"\w* thee, O \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, what \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; and what doth the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w require|strong="H1875"\w* of thee, but to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w justly|strong="H4941"\w*, and to \w love|strong="H0160"\w* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*, and to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w humbly|strong="H6800"\w* with thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*?\f + \fr 6.8 \ft walk…: Heb. humble thyself to walk\f*

The \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w crieth|strong="H7121"\w* unto the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \add the man of\add* \w wisdom|strong="H8454"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye the \w rod|strong="H4294"\w*, and who hath \w appointed|strong="H3259"\w* it.\f + \fr 6.9 \ft the man…: or, thy name shall see that which is\f*

¶ Are \w there|strong="H0786"\w* yet the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, and the \w scant|strong="H7332"\w* \w measure|strong="H0374"\w* \add that is\add* \w abominable|strong="H2194"\w*?\f + \fr 6.10 \ft Are…: or, Is there yet unto every man an house of the, etc\f*\f + \fr 6.10 \ft scant…: Heb. measure of leanness\f*

Shall I count \add them\add* \w pure|strong="H2135"\w* with the \w wicked|strong="H7562"\w* \w balances|strong="H3976"\w*, and with the \w bag|strong="H3599"\w* of \w deceitful|strong="H4820"\w* \w weights|strong="H0068"\w*?\f + \fr 6.11 \ft count…: or, be pure with, etc\f*

For the rich \w men|strong="H6223"\w* thereof are \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w*, and their \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \add is\add* \w deceitful|strong="H7423"\w* in their \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

Therefore also will I make \add thee\add* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w* in \w smiting|strong="H5221"\w* thee, in making \add thee\add* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* because of thy \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.

Thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, but not be \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*; and thy casting \w down|strong="H3445"\w* \add shall be\add* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thee; and thou shalt take \w hold|strong="H5253"\w*, but shalt not \w deliver|strong="H6403"\w*; and \add that\add* which thou \w deliverest|strong="H6403"\w* will I give \w up|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

Thou shalt \w sow|strong="H2232"\w*, but thou shalt not \w reap|strong="H7114"\w*; thou shalt \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* the \w olives|strong="H2132"\w*, but thou shalt not \w anoint|strong="H5480"\w* thee with \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*; and sweet \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, but shalt not \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*.

¶ For the \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* of \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w* are \w kept|strong="H8104"\w*, and all the \w works|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, and ye \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in their \w counsels|strong="H4156"\w*; that I should \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee a \w desolation|strong="H8047"\w*, and the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* thereof an \w hissing|strong="H8322"\w*: therefore ye shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.\f + \fr 6.16 \ft For the…: or, For he doth much keep the, etc\f*\f + \fr 6.16 \ft desolation: or, astonishment\f*
